Class DecisionView

  • public class DecisionView
extends View
    Used to handle the view for the decision Created on 11/3/2019
    Author:
    Theodor

    • Constructor Detail

      • DecisionView

        public DecisionView(int decisionNumber,
                    double econScore,
                    double envirmScore,
                    double overallScore,
                    double width,
                    double height,
                    java.lang.String decisionString)
        Constructor for DecisionView, this view creates the decision before each of the mini games
        Parameters:
        decisionNumber - int, which decision We are at
        econScore - double, Econ score which we want to display
        envirmScore - double, Envirm score which we want to display
        overallScore - double, Overall score which we want to display
        width - double, width of the screen
        height - double, height of the screen
        decisionString - String, this is the Question for the Decision

        Parameters:
        firstOrSecondChoice - int,background number to change to

      • changeLabelWithDecision

        public void changeLabelWithDecision(boolean decision)
        This display what gets increased or decreased because of the decision for each of The Decision.
        Parameters:
        decision - boolean,true if one decision is chosen, false if the other. Used to switch labels.
